Title: October 2022
Content: *p71873a01532*turn over  15  (iii)calculate the percentage by mass of vanadium in the ferrovanadium.(7)(d) in the manufacture of sulfuricacid, vanadium(v) oxide, v2o5, is the catalyst used in the conversion of sulfur dioxide to sulfur trioxide:2so2   +   o2      2so3write two equations to show a possible mechanism for this reaction. state symbols are not required.(2)(total for question 19 = 21 marks)

Title: October 2022
Content: *p71873a01632*16   *20 delocalised electron systems are important in determining the chemical properties of some compounds. compare and contrast the chemical reactions of bromine with benzene and cyclohexene, and with benzene and phenol, by considering the effects of delocalisedelectrons.detailed descriptions of the bonds or of the reaction mechanisms involved are notrequired.(6)
